thread.title: Russian soldier saves 'kidnap victim' - but it's on a film set
thread.title_full: Russian soldier saves 'kidnap victim' - but it's on a film set - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Russian soldier saves 'kidnap victim' - but it's on a film set
text:
Daily Mirror The ‘attacker’ can be seen holding a gun to the woman’s head as he negotiates with two other armed men. He wanted to be a hero.
This brave soldier believed he was rescuing a kidnapping victim who was being held at gunpoint by an attacker.
But in fact, the Russian serviceman had unknowingly wandered onto a film set in the middle of a tense scene.
Daily Mirror Suddenly, the soldier springs into action and sneaks up behind the man. As the clapperboard signals the start of filming, the ‘attacker’ can be seen holding a gun to the woman’s head as he negotiates with two other armed men.
Suddenly, the soldier springs into action and sneaks up behind the man to dramatically disarm him and free the woman.
facebook The fearless soldier dramatically disarms the man and frees the woman. The shocked crew members then rush into the scene to explain what is happening and help the actor back to his feet.
The bizarre video was uploaded to Facebook and YouTube where it has been viewed hundreds of thousands of times.
facebook The shocked crew members then rush into the scene to help the actor back to his feet. Viewers praised the soldier’s selfless actions, with one writing: "Haha, he [the soldier] had good intentions, that's what counts."
It is not clear whether the actor was injured in the incident, reported Mirror Online .
lhanna@nydailynews.com
